tokens.arbitraryValueRule: Any Tailwind arbitrary value must wrap var(--token)

noRawColors.description: Block hex/rgb/hsl literals and non-token bg/text/border/ring/shadow classes.

noArbitraryNonTokenValues.description: Block arbitrary Tailwind utilities unless they wrap var(--token).

tokenClassnamePatterns.description: Require token-prefixed color/typography utilities (bg-surface-*, text-fg-*, border-border-*).

noVendorImportsOutsideKit.description: Only allow imports from src/components/vendor/ui-primitives/shadcn/** inside src/components/kit/**.

kit.classNamePolicy: className overrides allowed for layout/composition only; colors/typography remain tokenized via CVA.

featureLayer.allowedUtilities: Standard Tailwind layout utilities plus token-prefixed color/typography classes.
